name: Corpulent Corpse
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Suspend 5—{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Cutthroat il-Dal
oracle_text: Hellbent — Cutthroat il-Dal has shadow as long as you have no cards in hand. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text: Her blades slashed across the noble's shadow. He scoffed, then fell over dead.

name: Enslave
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.

name: Sengir Nosferatu
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Exile Sengir Nosferatu: Create a 1/2 black Bat creature token with flying. It has "{1}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return an exiled card named Sengir Nosferatu to the battlefield under its owner's control."

name: Urborg Syphon-Mage
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

name: Sanguine Bond
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
flavor_text: "O sangue é constante. Para cada gota que eu bebo, alguém precisa sangrar." — Vradeen, vampiro noctívago

name: Yixlid Jailer
oracle_text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.
flavor_text: "I have an eternity to know the souls who are bound here, to behold their every facet. But moments from now they will be gagged and masked, and they shall be known by none other."

name: Dunerider Outlaw
oracle_text:
Protection from green
At the beginning of each end step, if Dunerider Outlaw dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Tales of the outlaw's cruelty and might grew more embellished with each crime.

name: Extirpate
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

name: Leyline of the Void
oracle_text:
If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

name: Mirri the Cursed
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike, haste
Whenever Mirri the Cursed deals combat damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirri the Cursed.
flavor_text: A hero fails, a martyr falls. Time twists and destinies interchange.

name: Street Wraith
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

name: Tasigur, the Golden Fang
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
{2}{G/U}{G/U}: Mill two cards, then return a nonland card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Gurmag Angler
oracle_text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
flavor_text: If everything in the Gurmag Swamp hungers for human flesh, what bait could be more effective?

name: Tombstalker
oracle_text:
Flying
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

name: Stinkweed Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.
Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)
